concept.title: DITA to Word output transform
concept.shortdesc: The "wordrtf" transform type will produce an RTF file for use by Microsoft Word.

conbody.p: The whole structure of the output file is the same as the structure designed in the ditamap file of the DITA source files. To avoid losing files in the final output, make sure the ditamap file contains all topics which are cross referenced from within any individual topics.
